0.text: Innate: Teemo gains  invisibility after 1.5 seconds without moving, taking damage, performing actions that break stealth,  channeling, or being in  stasis. Teemo will maintain stealth so long as he remains idle and is not  displaced. While in  brush, Teemo gains the stealth even while moving and can move without breaking stealth.

1.text: Innate - Element of Surprise: When Teemo breaks the stealth, he gains  20 / 40 / 60 / 80% (based on level) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

0.text: Active: Teemo shoots a dart at the target enemy that deals magic damage and  blinds them for a few seconds.

1.text: The duration of the  blind is doubled against  minions and  monsters.

0.text: Passive: Teemo gains  bonus movement speed after 5 seconds without taking damage from enemy  champions or  turrets.

1.text: Active: Teemo gains bonus movement speed for 3 seconds. This overrides the passive bonus, but prevents the passive effect from being removed.

2.text: Casting Move Quick does not interrupt  Guerrilla Warfare.

0.text:
Passive: Teemo's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage  on-hit and inflict  poison.
 poison: The target takes magic damage every second over 4 seconds. Subsequent inflictions refresh the duration.

1.text: Toxic Shot deals 150% damage against  monsters.

0.text: Active: Teemo tosses a poisonous mushroom to the target location that becomes  stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 5 minutes and granting  sight of its surroundings. The mushroom will bounce forward upon landing on another.

1.text: Teemo periodically stocks a Noxious Trap charge, up to a maximum amount.

2.text:
The mushroom will explode upon enemy contact, inflicting  poison to nearby enemies and  slowing them for 4 seconds, as well as  revealing them.
 poison: The target takes magic damage every second over 4 seconds. Subsequent inflictions refresh the duration.

3.text: A mushroom has  6 maximum health and can be damaged only by  champion basic attacks (2 damage from  ranged and 3 from  melee).

4.text: See Pets for more details about mushroom traps.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

Keywords

Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」

1.originHTML: +  +  1000

stats.originHTML:

+450 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Dark Pact: Gain ability power equal to 2% bonus health.
Unique – Azakana Gaze: Dealing ability damage curses enemies, causing them to take「 ( 7.2% / 4%) of their maximum health as total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」「 ( 1.8% / 1%) of their maximum health as magic damage every second over 4 seconds. 」
passive.originText: UNIQUE – DARK PACT: Gain ability power equal to 2% bonus health.

part1.concerningText: Toxic Shot deals 150% damage against  monsters.

Toxic Shot deals 150% damage against  monsters.

part0.concerningText: Active: Teemo tosses a poisonous mushroom to the target location that becomes  stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 5 minutes and granting  sight of its surroundings. The mushroom will bounce forward upon landing on another.

part1.concerningText:
The mushroom will explode upon enemy contact, inflicting  poison to nearby enemies and  slowing them for 4 seconds, as well as  revealing them.
 poison: The target takes magic damage every second over 4 seconds. Subsequent inflictions refresh the duration.

part2.concerningText: Teemo periodically stocks a Noxious Trap charge, up to a maximum amount.

part0.concerningText: Active: Teemo shoots a dart at the target enemy that deals magic damage and  blinds them for a few seconds.
Active: Teemo shoots a dart at the target enemy that deals magic damage and  blinds them for a few seconds.

part1.concerningText: The duration of the  blind is doubled against  minions and  monsters.

part0.concerningText: Passive: Teemo gains  bonus movement speed after 5 seconds without taking damage from enemy  champions or  turrets.

part1.concerningText: Active: Teemo gains bonus movement speed for 3 seconds. This overrides the passive bonus, but prevents the passive effect from being removed.
